name: Jervis Bay
overviewText: Jervis Bay is a breathtaking coastal gem, renowned for its beautiful beaches, vibrant marine life, and endless outdoor adventures. Booderee National Park is a must-visit for nature lovers, offering a range of trails, picnic areas, and stunning views. Pack a bag for a weekend getaway; camp at Green Patch, snorkel in the calm waters of Murrays Beach, and explore scenic trails like Gosangs Tunnel.

recommendations.title: Gosangs Tunnel & Abrahams Bosom Reserve
recommendations.description: Scenic walking trail through a historic tunnel leading to a stunning secluded beach reserve.

recommendations.title: Woebegone Freediving
recommendations.description: Professional freediving experiences in Jervis Bay's crystal-clear waters with vibrant marine life.

recommendations.title: The Grotto Walk
recommendations.description: Short coastal walk leading to a picturesque rock grotto with ocean views.

recommendations.title: Earnest Arthur
recommendations.description: Charming caf√© in Huskisson perfect for relaxing after a day of exploring the bay.

activities.name: Snorkeling!
highlights: Calm, clear waters with vibrant marine life.
Ideal for a quiet day of swimming and snorkeling.

activities.name: Exploring Huskisson
highlights: Charming coastal town with a variety of dining options.
Perfect for relaxing after a day of exploring.

activities.name: Camping at Green Patch
highlights: Enjoy the natural beauty and tranquility of Jervis Bay.
Great for outdoor enthusiasts.

activities.name: Wildlife Spotting at Cave Beach
highlights: Look out for wallabies in the area.
Picturesque beach with a rugged charm.

activities.name: Kiyama Blow Hole
highlights: A natural blowhole that creates spectacular water spouts.

activities.name: Blenheim Beach
highlights: A beautiful beach ideal for swimming and relaxing.

activities.name: Greenfield Beach
highlights: A family-friendly beach with picnic areas.

activities.name: Jervis Bay / Booderee National Park
highlights: Explore stunning landscapes and diverse wildlife.

activities.name: Murrays Beach
highlights: Top spot for snorkeling enthusiasts.
Crystal clear water and impressive marine diversity.

activities.name: Cave Beach
highlights: Look out for wallabies in the area.
Picturesque beach with a rugged charm.

activities.name: Gosangs Tunnel
highlights: A unique rock formation and tunnel to explore.

activities.name: Abrahams Bosom Reserve
highlights: A scenic reserve with walking trails and views.

activities.name: The Grotto Walk
highlights: A scenic walk with stunning coastal views.

activities.name: World Famous Fish and Chips
highlights: Great spot for some fried food by the beach.

activities.name: Taj Indian Restaurant
highlights: Indian restaurant known for its egg curry.

activities.name: Nana Thai Restaurant
highlights: Offers a variety of Thai dishes.

activities.name: Earnest Arthur
highlights: A local favorite for coffee, pies and pastries.

tips.heading: Transportation
tips.details: Rent a car to explore Jervis Bay, as public transport options are limited.

tips.heading: Camping
tips.details: Consider camping at Green Patch for a unique experience in nature.

tips.heading: Snorkeling Gear
tips.details: Bring your snorkeling gear or rent it locally to explore the underwater beauty.

tips.heading: Wildlife
tips.details: Keep an eye out for wallabies and other wildlife, especially at Cave Beach.

tips.heading: Dining
tips.details: Don't miss out on local dining options in Huskisson, including seafood and international cuisine.
